description: Sometimes technology can be tricky to get to grips with, and now one mother has become an unlikely internet sensation after her son revealed she photocopies recipes direct from her tablet.
title: Mother photocopies screen of her iPad in funny tech fail
title_page: Mother photocopies screen of her iPad in funny tech fail | Daily Mail Online
text:
A baffled son has unwittingly turned his mother into an internet sensation after sharing a hilarious snap of her technology fail online.
Imgur user Devillius revealed how his mother photocopies recipes direct from her iPad screen, leaving commenters in stitches.
Rather than hooking up to a wireless printer or indeed reading the recipe off the screen, the unnamed woman - believed to be from the US - prefers an old fashioned hard copy.
Imgur user Devillius shared a hilarious snap showing how his mother photocopies recipes direct from her iPad screen, which has now had almost a million views
The post entitled 'My mom photocopies recipes off of her iPad' has been viewed almost a million times across Facebook and Imgur, prompting users to share tales of their own parents' shortcomings when it comes to tech.
One commenter recalled how their grandmother used to transcribe recipes from Facebook into a notebook, not realising she could just print them out.
Another shared that their mother goes even further by taking photos of her laptop screen, using her mobile phone, and then printing them out.
However, some people were more sympathetic to the plight of the technologically inept mother.
One pointed out that it's tricky to hook up an iPad to a printer, while another said it's an efficient way to get a hard copy of a document you need.
